## Description
Brief description of the task that would be good for someone new to the project.

## Expected Outcome
What should the completed task look like?

## Getting Started
- [ ] I've read [CONTRIBUTING.md](../CONTRIBUTING.md)
- [ ] I've forked the repository
- [ ] I've set up my development environment

## Additional Context
Any additional information, resources, or examples that would help.

## Difficulty Level
- [ ] Beginner
- [ ] Intermediate
- [ ] Advanced
